name: Blue Tree Premium Florianopolis
description: Blue Tree Premium Florianópolis boasts an outdoor swimming pool with panoramic views of the city. Offering free WiFi, guests will also have a gym and a sauna available. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests. All rooms at this Blue Tree Premium Florianópolis hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a minibar and a digital safe. Beira-Mar Shopping mall is 55 metres from Blue Tree Premium Florianópolis. Hercílio Luz International Airport is 14 km away.

name: Farol da Ilha Hotel
description: Spacious accommodation with and free WiFi is offered at Farol da Ilha. The hotel is situated in downtown Florianopolis, just 80 metres from the bus station. Rooms at Hotel Farol da Ilha feature basic furnishings, are air conditioned and equipped with a minibar. The private bathrooms have showers. Rates do not include breakfast. We offer breakfast at an additional cost of R$ 28.00 (per person) at Hotel Faial Prime, 50 meters away. Florianópolis’s Airport is only 13 km away. Private parking is available at the hotel for a surcharge.

name: Valerim Florianópolis
description: Valerim Florianópolis offers 3-star accommodations with free WiFi and a rich breakfast with 70 different items served at the restaurant on site. Each non-smoking guestroom is equipped with air conditioning, telephone, minibar and 32" LCD cable TV. You will also find a 24-hour front desk and a business centre at Valerim. Valerim Florianópolis is located in Florianópolis city centre, near the Convention Center, the Public Market and the main bus station.

name: Joaquina Beach Hotel
address: Av Pref Acacio Garibaldi S Thiago, 2323, Florianopolis 88062-600
description: Set within 1 minute away from the beach, Joaquina Beach Hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool and a sauna on site. Lagoa da Conceição Lagoon is located 2 km away. Free WiFi is offered in public areas and free private parking is available on site. Some rooms offer air-conditioning, and all rooms are equipped with a TV, minibar and safe. They are simply styled with tiled floors and provide a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks. Florianópolis centre is 17KM away from the property and Hercilio Luz Airport is located 15 km away.

name: Ilha Forte Praia Hotel
description: Set in Florianópolis, within 200 metres of Praia da Cachoeira do Bom Jesus and 2.2 km of Praia de Canasvieiras, Ilha Forte Praia Hotel features accommodation with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 2.4 km from Pontas das Canas Beach, 20 km from Floripa Mall and 25 km from Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall. The accommodation offers room service, and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all guest rooms at Ilha Forte Praia Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at Ilha Forte Praia Hotel can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. Campeche Island is 38 km from the hotel, while Waterpark Água Show is 5.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International, 36 km from Ilha Forte Praia Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel
description: Situated in Florianópolis, Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel is located on the oceanfront of Praia dos Ingleses, in Santa Catarina. It offers a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool, and an indoor pool. All are equipped with air conditioning, free WiFi, minibar, hairdryer, telephone, safety deposit box and flat-screen TV. At lunch and dinner times, the restaurant offers regional and international food as well as a special menu for children for a surcharge. At the 4-star Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel, guests can take advantage of a tennis court, games room, gym, and soccer, volleyball and basketball courts. A TV lounge, sauna, hot tub and spa treatments are also provided. Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 21 km from the accommodation, while Campeche Island is 28 km away. The International Airport is about 39 km away from property.

name: Ibis Florianopolis
description: Strategically located, with modern accommodations and great service, ibis Florianópolis will be happy to have you. Rooms are comfortable for either couples and singles, with WIFI and air conditioning. The lobby restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The bar area is open 24/7. Here, you'll have third-party laundry and car park. For a small fee and with updated vet card, your pet is welcome here.accorhotels.com

name: Villas Jurerê Hotel Boutique
description: Villas Jurerê Hotel Boutique is situated at the north corner of Florianópolis, just 50 metres away from Jurerê beach, and features a sauna and a rich breakfast buffet All rooms are air-conditioned and offer a balcony. Each guest room has its own unique colour and is equipped with a ceiling fan and a cable TV. Guests can also make use of a microwave and a minibar. Villas Jurerê Hotel Boutique features free WiFi, 24-hour front desk and 4-wheel bikes available upon request due to availability. Guided vineyard tours and massage services may also be arranged at the property. The property is located less than 35 km away from Hercílio Luz International Airport. Free on-site parking is possible.

name: Oscar Hotel
description: Offering affordable accommodation, Oscar Hotel is centrally located to Florianópolis’ business district. The Beiramar Shopping Centre and the Public Market are within walking distance. Free WiFi is provided on site. All cosy rooms are fitted with air conditioning, TV and a minibar. There is also a work desk in each room. Bathrooms are private. Oscar Hotel operates a 24-hour front desk and provides private parking on site for a surcharge. Guests can also enjoy wholesome breakfasts which include a variety of breads and fruits. From the Oscar Hotel, guests have easy access to cinemas, museums and beaches.

name: Hotel Monteiro Canasvieiras
description: Hotel Monteiro Canasvieiras is situated in the Canasvieiras district of Florianópolis, 19 km from Floripa Mall, 24 km from Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall and 37 km from Campeche Island. The accommodation is 12 km from Casa Açoriana Handcraft, and guests benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site. The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. Waterpark Água Show is 7 km from the apartment, while Praia dos Ingleses is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 27 km from Hotel Monteiro Canasvieiras.

name: Nova Pousada dos Chás
description: No description found

name: Hotel São Sebastião da Praia
description: Just 500 metres from Campeche Beach, Hotel São Sebastião da Praia offers spacious chalets. Surrounded by the Atlantic Forest, it features an outdoor thermal pool, an indoor pool and a playground. Extras include barbecue facilities for a surcharge. WiFi is free. The chalets at the Hotel São Sebastião feature attractive brickwork interiors and private balconies with scenic garden views. All are equipped with air conditioning, TV and a minibar. Guests at the Hotel São Sebastião da Praia can enjoy a daily breakfast buffet with fresh fruits, juices and pastries. Hot water for the Chimarrão drink is also offered. The hotel is conveniently located only 16 km from Hercilio Luz Airport. Free private parking is provided.

name: Canasvieiras Hotel
address: Av. Prof. Milton Leite da Costa, 825, Florianopolis 88054-230
description: Off Santa Catarina’s coast, the Canasvieiras Hotel offers direct beach access and a private, outdoor swimming pool with sea-facing sun loungers. All rooms feature cable TV and air conditioning. Each of the Canasvieiras’s bright rooms is equipped with tile flooring and en suite facilities. Room service is offered throughout the day. Guests can enjoy breakfast at the on site restaurant or relax in the Canasvieiras Hotel’s gardens. Car rental and a 24-hr reception are available at the hotel. The lively shops and restaurants of Florianópolis city centre are a 15-minute drive away. Hercilio Luz Airport is under 30 km from Canasvieiras.

name: Diaudi Hotel
description: Located in São José centre, Diaudi Hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a business centre and 24-hour front desk service. Florianópolis can be reached within a 10-minute drive and Praia do Campeche Beach is 20 km away. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Diaudi contain cable TV, a minibar and a bathroom and apartments offer a kitchenette and a sofa bed. They are tastefully styled and provide bed linen and bath towels. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks.

name: Morro das Pedras Clube Hotel
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 100 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and ceiling fans. Amenities Pamper yourself with onsite massages or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a picnic area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Florianópolis (Campeche), Morro das Pedras Clube Hotel is within a 5-minute drive of Armação Beach and Praia do Campeche. This beach hotel is 2.4 mi (3.9 km) from Campeche Island and 3.1 mi (5 km) from Matadeiro Beach. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service. Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM Checkin end at midnight The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 10:00 AM Pets Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Masks are available to guests Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Gap period enforced between guest stays - 72 hours Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: San Diego Apart Hotel
description: At 300 metres from Santa Catarina´s Canasvieiras Beach, San Diego Apart offers apartments with a full kitchen and free Wi-Fi. Guests enjoy a swimming pool, a hot tub and a sauna. Accommodation in HANNA San Diego Apart Hotel - Canasvieiras comes with cable TV and a minibar. Rooms are equipped with a sofa bed as well. The hotel´s facilities also include a barbecue and a games room that provides a ping pong table and billiards. HANNA San Diego Apart Hotel - Canasvieiras is located one block from Canasvieiras shops and restaurants, and 30 km from Florianópolis.

name: Tri Hotel Florianópolis
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and garden, Tri Hotel Florianópolis is located within a 20-minute drive from popular beaches of Florianópolis. It offers free WiFi and free parking. The air-conditioned rooms are bright and spacious, telephone and minibar. Amenities also include a private bathroom and work desk. Amenities are available. Buffet breakfast is available daily, with a variety of fruits, natural juices and cakes. Tri Hotel Florianópolis is located only 300 metres from Centro Multiuso de São José convention centre. Hercílio Luz International Airport is 18 km away, and Florianópolis’ centre is just 5 km from the hotel.

name: Cris Hotel
address: Av. Pref. Acacio Garibaldi S. Thiago, 2399, Florianopolis 88062-600
description: Located right on the sands of popular Joaquina Beach, Cris Hotel offers free WiFi throughout the property and private parking. It also provides a delicious daily buffet breakfast. With tiled floors and plenty of natural light, the accommodation at Cris Hotel includes a private bathroom, air conditioning, TV and minibar. Some rooms also feature a balcony with sea views. Other facilities offered at Cris Hotel include 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and also a TV area. Mole Beach and Conceição Lagoon are 1.5 km from this hotel. Hercílio Luz International Airport and Florianópolis city centre are both within 21 km.

name: Hotel Torres Da Cachoeira
description: Located on Cachoeira do Bom Jesus Beach, Hotel Torres da Cachoeira's design uses glass and natural light. It offers complete leisure activities including an outdoor pool with sun terrace. The El Faro Restaurant offers contemporary cuisine using fresh local ingredients, and has a tempting dessert table. The well-lit rooms at Hotel Torres are comfortable, decorated with neutral green and cream decor. All are equipped with air conditioning and a TV, while some offer spacious balconies with sea views. Hotel Torres da Cachoeira is 31km from Hercilio Luz Airport, and 9 km from exclusive Jurerê Beach. It offers free parking.

name: Marine Home & Resort, condomínio clube com ótima área comum
description: No description found

name: Hotel Palace 1
description: Ideally situated beachfront to Canasvieiras Beach, Hotel Palace 1 offers free breakfast and rooms with beautiful ocean views and free Wi-Fi. With a balcony, each airy room. They are equipped with air conditioning and minibar. At this hotel, guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool as admiring sea views. Hotel Palace 1 is 13 minutes’ drive from Jurerê Beach, 20 minutes’ drive from Praia dos Ingleses Beach and 20 km from Florianópolis City Centre. Limited on-site parking is available on a reservation basis.

name: Apto em Resort de luxo próximo ao mar ILC
description: With a stay at Apto em Resort de luxo próximo ao mar ILC in Florianopolis (Jurere), you'll be a 4-minute walk from Jurerê Open Shopping and 12 minutes by foot from Jurere Beach. Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Natur Campeche
description: Hotel Natur is surrounded by tropical gardens and located near the long, white sandy beach between Campeche and Joaquina Morro das Pedras. The centre of Florianópolis is 15 kilometres away. Hotel Natur Campeche has a small swimming pool and an outdoor hot tub. Free Wi-Fi, free on-site parking are available to all guests. The multi-lingual staff of Hotel Natur Campeche can arrange airport transfers and car rental for you.

name: Brisamar Suite Hotel
description: Brisamar Suite Hotel offers accommodation in the district of Jardim Atlântico in Florianópolis. Free WiFi and free parking are also available here. The rooms are simply furnished with tiled floor and equipped with air conditioning and a minibar. Brisamar Suite Hotel also offers an outdoor pool for guests to relax. Hercilio Luz Bridge is 4 km from the property, whilst Hercílio Luz International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Pousada Vila Tamarindo
description: No description found

name: Pousada & Hostel Mar dos Ingleses
address: 113 Servidão Flor do Campo Limpo, Florianopolis 88058-422
description: In a prime location in the Ingleses district of Florianópolis, Pousada & Hostel Mar dos Ingleses is situated 23 km from Floripa Mall, 28 km from Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall and 34 km from Campeche Island. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.2 km from Ingleses Beach. Guests at the hotel can enjoy an American breakfast. Waterpark Água Show is 4.4 km from Pousada & Hostel Mar dos Ingleses, while Tamar Project is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 38 km from the accommodation.

name: Mar de Canasvieiras Hotel & Eventos
description: This 3-star hotel provides contemporary accommodation just one block from Canasvieiras Beach. It features an indoor pool with sun-loungers and Atlantic Ocean views. The bright rooms at Mar de Canasvieiras Hotel are well-appointed with air conditioning and a TV. They also include en suite facilities. Mar de Canasvieiras Hotel e Eventos is a short walk from the Avenida Nations, a well-known shopping street. The Hercilio Luz Airport is less than 30 km from the hotel and an airport shuttle transfer can be prearranged.

name: Hotel Residencial Ilha Bela
description: Just 100 metres from Praia da Barra da Lagoa Beach, this hotel offers rooms and studios with free Wi-Fi and free parking. A barbecue facility and a games room are available for use. Residencial Ilhabela offers rooms and self-catering studios. Rooms provide air conditioning, TV and minibar, while studios contain an additional kitchenette with a refrigerator. Praia do Moçambique and Mole beaches can be reached in a 5-minute drive. Iguatemi Shopping Mall is 15 km from Hotel Residencial Ilhabela. Florianópolis city centre and Hercílio Luz International Airport are both 20 km away.

name: Residencial Sol e Mar de Floripa
description: No description found

name: Flor Inn Praia Hotel
address: Rua Servidão Ireno Luiz Martins, 49, Florianopolis 88058-600
description: Set in Florianópolis, within 200 metres of Ingleses Beach and 2.7 km of Santinho Beach, Florinn Praia Hotel offers accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 23 km from Floripa Mall, 28 km from Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall and 35 km from Campeche Island. Certain units at the property feature a patio with a garden view. The units at the hotel come with a seating area. All rooms are complete with a private bathroom and air conditioning, and selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony. At Florinn Praia Hotel all rooms come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Waterpark Água Show is 4.8 km from the accommodation, while Tamar Project is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International, 38 km from Florinn Praia Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Cambirela Hotel
description: Located 5 km from the city's convention centre, Cambirela Hotel offers modern accommodation with free WiFi. Facilities include adults and kids swimming pools. Orlando Scarpelli Stadium is situated 500 metres away. Private parking is available surcharge. The air-conditioned rooms of the property feature comfortable beds and private bathrooms. All are equipped with flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar and a safety box. At Cambirela Hotel guests can enjoy some region's typical dishes, served at the restaurant. At the bar it is possible to socialise while tasting a selection of drinks. Cambirela Hotel offers infrastructure for events, which can accommodate up to 1200 people. The reception operates 24 hours a day. The property also has an agreement with Smart Fit gym for guests' benefit. Located in Florianopolis, the Cambirela Hotel is conveniently situated close to shopping malls, restaurants and bars.

name: Thaiji Pousada e Parador
description: No description found

name: Pousada Old Beach
description: No description found

name: Hotel Don Zepe
description: Located in Florianópolis near Conceição Lake, Hotel Don Zepe offers LCD cable TV and free internet. Bars, restaurants and shops are within walking distance. The rooms at Don Zepe Hotel provide en suite bathroom, seating area and air conditioning. Guests can enjoy the view of Conceição Lake from the breakfast room, which can also be used to host events. The Don Zepe offers a 24-hour front desk and car rental service. Praia da Joaquina beach and Praia mole beach are both 3 km away.

name: Caravaggio Praia Hotel
address: R. Ranulpho José de Souza Sobrinho 323, Florianopolis 88054-430
description: Only 100 meters from Florianópolis’ Canasvieiras Beach, Caravaggio Praia Hotel, offers free WiFi and accommodation with self-catering capabilities. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Free WiFi is available. The daily breakfast buffet offers a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats. Guests can also enjoy regional specialties at the restaurant. Caravaggio Praia Hotel is walking distance from dining and shopping options, and within 2 km of Jurerê and 3.5 km of Jurerê Internacional Beaches. Central Florianópolis and its bus terminal are 27 km from the hotel, and Hercílio Luz Airport is 35 km away. Free parking with no specific parking lot. Please advice to the front desk during the check in, in order to confirm availability.

name: Hotel Porto Sol Beach
address: Rua Das Buganvilias, 123 Praia Cachoeira de Bom Jesus, Florianopolis 88056-025
description: Boasting an outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Porto Sol Beach is on the beachfront and offers comfortable accommodation in Florianópolis. It features a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and organising tours for guests. All rooms at Hotel Porto Sol Beach feature a cable TV, air conditioning, a seating area and a modern, en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms also have a balcony with a sea view. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Hotel Porto Sol Beach offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at the hotel. Praia de Canasvieiras is 350 metres from Hotel Porto Sol Beach, while Pontas das Canas Beach is 2.3 km away.

name: Pousada Do Capitão
description: No description found

name: Hotel Das Palmas
description: Ideally set in the Canasvieiras district of Florianópolis, Hotel das Palmas is set 300 metres from Praia de Canasvieiras, 300 metres from Canajure Beach and 1.2 km from Jurerê Tradicional. Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, this 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a shared lounge, room service and organising tours for guests. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At Hotel das Palmas the rooms come with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Praia da Cachoeira do Bom Jesus is 2.3 km from Hotel das Palmas, while Floripa Mall is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 35 km from the hotel.

name: Pousada Rumi's
description: No description found

name: Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras
description: Set in Florianópolis, within 60 metres of Praia de Canasvieiras and 800 metres of Praia da Cachoeira do Bom Jesus, Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras offers accommodation with a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Some rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, a minibar and a stovetop. An American breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. You can play billiards at Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras, and the area is popular for hiking and fishing. Canajure Beach is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Floripa Mall is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International, 34 km from Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Rede Andrade Cecomtur
description: Boasting a sun terrace, Cecomtur Hotel offers accommodation in the centre of Florianopolis. The city's Public Market is located only 500 metres and Florianópolis Cathedral, 50 metres. With modern décor, soundproofed rooms at Cecomtur provide a private bathroom, cable TV and minibar. Extras include free toiletries. Cecomtur. Aderbal Ramos da Silva Stadium and Hercilio Luz International Airport are both within 12.5 km.

name: Pousada Mar de Dentro
description: Situated in Florianópolis, 90 metres from Praia de Santo Antônio de Lisboa, Pousada Mar de Dentro features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a garden. Located around 2.8 km from Praia de Sambaqui, the inn with free WiFi is also 5.8 km away from Floripa Mall. The property is non-smoking and is located 2 km from Praia de Cacupé. At the inn, the rooms include a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Pousada Mar de Dentro have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Pousada Mar de Dentro offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 11 km from the inn, while Campeche Island is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 21 km from Pousada Mar de Dentro.

name: Hotel Geranius Praia Dos Ingleses
address: Rua Silveira, 108 - Praia Dos Ingleses, Florianopolis 88058-646
description: Located in Florianópolis, 200 metres from Ingleses Beach, Hotel Geranius Ingleses provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Located in the Ingleses district, the property provides guests with access to a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Geranius Ingleses every room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Hotel Geranius Ingleses offers a children's playground. You can play billiards and table tennis at the 4-star hotel. Santinho Beach is 2.5 km from the hotel, while Floripa Mall is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 38 km from Hotel Geranius Ingleses.

name: Pousada Ilha da Magia
address: Av. Pref. Acacio Garibaldi Santiago, 23, Florianopolis 88062-600
description: These well-equipped, charming chalets are right by Conceição Lagoon, in Florianópolis. Amenities at Pousada Ilha da Magia include 2 panoramic pools and exuberant gardens, plus free Wi-Fi and free parking. The chalets offer differentiated décor, with nice colour schemes. Equipped with flat-screen TV with cable channels and hot and cold air conditioning, they also have a dining area with a minibar, microwave and sandwhich maker. Guests at Pousada Ilha da Magia can enjoy a BBQ and relax in the garden. Ilha da Magia provides a tour desk for local excursions and shuttle service to the airport, bus station, and rental car service. Guests can rent kayaks, stand up paddle boards, and kite surf equipment in front of the property. The pousada is located 800 metres from Mole Beach and 2 km from Joaquina Beach. Florianópolis Cathedral is 17 km away.

name: Iate Hotel Florianópolis
description: Offering a restaurant, bar, and a fitness centre, Iate Hotel Florianópolis is located in Florianópolis. This hotel is conveniently located 500 metres from the city centre, and free WiFi access is available. These air conditioned rooms are bright, spacious and elegantly furnished. Each room features a desk, flat-screen cable TV, and a minibar. A hearty buffet breakfast is provided every morning, and the restaurant serves regional and international cuisine. Victor Meirelles Museum is 1.3 km from Iate Hotel Florianópolis, and the Santa Catarina Museum is 8 minutes by taxi. Several city parks are reachable within a 10-minute walk. Centro Sul Convention Centre is 700 metres from this property. A bus station is located 500 metres from the door, and the Hercílio Luz International Airport is 13 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Canasvieiras Internacional
description: Just 200 metres from Canasvieiras beach, this hotel offers buffet breakfast, a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Free WiFi access is available. Rooms at Hotel Canasvieiras Internacional provide an LCD TV, minibar and safe. The private bathroom includes a shower. The hotel also features a large conference room. Jurerê Internacional beach is 7 km away. Florinópolis city centre is located 30 km from Hotel Canasvieiras Internacional. Hercílio Luz international airport is 35 km from this property.

name: Hotel Dom Fish
description: Set 500 metres from Florianópolis’ Canasvieiras Beach and walking distance from bars, shops and restaurants, Dom Fish Hotel & Rede Hs Hotelaria has a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. Jurerê Internacional Beach is 6 km away. Simply decorated, all rooms at Dom Fish are air-conditioned. They offer a minibar, safe and private bathroom with a hot shower. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks. Dom Fish is 27 km from Florianópolis centre and its bus terminal. Hercílio Luz International Airport is 37 km away.

name: Hotel & Pousada Favareto
address: Estrada Int. João Nunes Vieira, 1800, Florianopolis 88058-100
description: Ideally located, Hotel & Pousada Favareto is just 150 metres from Praia dos Ingleses Beach and a block from restaurants, bars and shops. It features an outdoor swimming pool, game-room and BBQ. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are available. In a cozy style, the Hotel & Pousada Favareto offers all rooms with air conditioning, mini bar, cable TV, safe and bathroom. Hotel & Pousada Favareto is 35 km from Florianópolis centre. Floripa International Airport is 45 km away.

name: Pousada Dunasol Floripa
description: Pousada Dunasol Floripa is a bungalow style hotel, offering apartments and spacious self-service chalets with free Wi-Fi. Services include an outdoor pool and complimentary on site parking. Accommodations at the Pousada Dunasol Floripa have simple, rustic interiors, and are equipped with air conditioning and a TV. Private chalets feature a fully equipped kitchen and a veranda. The hotel offers an attractive location, midway between Joaquina's Beach and Conceição Lake. It is only 9 km from Hercilio Luz Airport and 17 km from the centre of Florianopolis.

name: Coliseu Palace Residence
description: Well set in the Canasvieiras district of Florianópolis, Coliseu Palace Residence is located 600 metres from Praia de Canasvieiras, 1.6 km from Praia da Cachoeira do Bom Jesus and 1.9 km from Canajure Beach. This 3-star inn offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The inn also provides free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom, while some rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with a city view. Floripa Mall is 18 km from the inn, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 34 km from Coliseu Palace Residence.

name: Pousada TonaPraia
description: No description found

name: Hanna Praia Hotel - Canasvieiras
description: Situated in Florianópolis, 300 metres from Praia de Canasvieiras, HANNA Praia Hotel - Canasvieiras features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Located around 2.8 km from Canajure Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also 19 km away from Floripa Mall. The property is non-smoking and is located 500 metres from Praia da Cachoeira do Bom Jesus. At the hotel, the rooms come with a wardrobe. At HANNA Praia Hotel - Canasvieiras rooms include air conditioning and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish and Portuguese. Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 24 km from HANNA Praia Hotel - Canasvieiras, while Campeche Island is 37 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 34 km from the hotel.

name: Selina Floripa
address: 2001 Rodovia Jornalista Manoel de Menezes, Florianopolis
description: Facing the beachfront, Selina Floripa offers 3-star accommodation in Florianópolis and has an outdoor swimming pool, garden and shared lounge. Among the various facilities are a terrace, a restaurant, as well as a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. Guests at the hotel can enjoy an American breakfast. Selina Floripa offers a hot spring bath. You can play billiards and table tennis at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Selina Floripa include Mole Beach, Praia Lagoa da Conceição and Praia da Galheta. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Pousada Bangalôs Da Mole - Florianópolis
address: Rod Jornalista Manoel De Menezes, 1007, Florianopolis 88061-700
description: Located in front of Florianópolis’ famous Praia Mole Beach, Pousada Bangalôs Da Mole - Florianópolis offers spacious rooms and free Wi-Fi. Free parking is available on site. The bungalows feature a seating area with a sofa and TV. Some boast a balcony with sea views. All bungalows are air-conditioned. The dunes at Praia da Joaquina Beach are 5 km from the guesthouse. Florianópolis centre is 19 km away, as well as its bus terminal. Bangalôs da Mole is 21 km from Hercilio Luz airport.

name: Encantos Lexus ingleses
description: Encantos Lexus ingleses is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Florianopolis. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Facilities like 24-hour front desk, car park, restaurant are readily available for you to enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Florianopolis has to offer by making Encantos Lexus ingleses your base.Agoda

name: Hotel Canto da Ilha
description: Set in Florianópolis, 400 metres from Pontas das Canas Beach, Canto da Ilha offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Canto da Ilha all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Praia da Cachoeira do Bom Jesus is 1 km from Canto da Ilha, while Floripa Mall is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 38 km from the hotel.

name: Express Floripa Residence
address: Intendente Joao Nunes Vieira 1939 - Ingleses, Florianopolis 88058-600
description: No description found

name: Hotel Sete Ilhas
description: Sete Ilhas offers contemporary accommodation in Jurere Beach with panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean. Rooms at the Hotel Sete Ilhas are decorated with designer furnishings and a 26-inch flat-screen cable TV. Each includes a lounge, a kitchenette and a dining area. Guests can cook their own meal or enjoy a selection of dishes from the region, served at the restaurant of the hotel. They can also discover many nearby bars and cafes. Sete Ilhas hotel is located 23 km from central Florianópolis. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Vila Mar
description: In front of Canasvieiras beach, Hotel Vila Mar features a 24-hour front desk and room service, and Wi-Fi for free. It is 300 metres from the centre of Canasvieiras and just a 30-minute drive from Florianópolis centre. Beach chairs and sun parasols are available at a charge. Hotel Vila Mar’s rooms have a balcony with sea views, an LCD TV with cable channels, air conditioning, and a minibar. The private bathroom offers a hot shower. Hotel Vila Mar provides an airport shuttle service and can also organise car rentals. It features a luggage storage service. Parking is also available for a fee. The property is 3 blocks from the shops, bars and restaurants in the commercial centre of Canasvieiras. Hotel Vila Mar is 6 km from the beachside activities at Jurerê Beach.

name: Hotel Hola
address: Rua Crisogono Vieira da Cruz, 304, Florianopolis 88062-110
description: Boasting an outdoor pool, Hola is a 3-star hotel, located next to Lagoa da Conceição, in Florianópolis. It is 4 km from the Mole and the Joaquina Beach. Free WiFi is offered and free private parking is available on site. The hotel provides air-conditioned suites that are equipped with LCD TVs, minibars, solar-heated showers, anti-allergy pillows, and electronic locks. Hola Hotel is situated in a secure area with a bus station in front of the hotel. Throughout the property, guests can also enjoy many works of art by artists from all over Brazil.

name: Pousada Nossa Senhora de Fatima
address: Estrada Critóvão Machado de Campos, 1379, Florianopolis 88052-600
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a Smart TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, kitchenware and utensils, and an extra futon mattress.Expedia

name: Pousada Gomes
address: Rua Maria Tomasia Cabral, Travessa A - Nº 32 Ingleses, Florianopolis 88058-193
description: No description found

name: Hotel Ilhasul
address: Rua Vasco de Oliveira Gondim, 589, Florianopolis 88054-110
description: Ideally located just one block from Canasvieiras Beach, Ilhasul Hotel Residencia offers adult and children pools, a deck with sun loungers and a terrace with chairs and tables overlooking the street. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is possible on site. The air-conditioned apartments are fitted with a seating area, a kitchen with a refrigerator, stove, and utensils. There is also a TV and a private bathroom with a hot shower. Wi-Fi is free. Other facilities at the property include a 24-hour front desk,barbecue facilities and a shared lounge. The hotel is located 5 km from Jurerê Internacional Beach and 20 km from Florianópolis centre and bus terminal. Hercílio Luz Airport is 30 km away and free private parking is provided.

name: Hotel Boulevard Beach Canasvieiras
description: Just 80 metres from Praia de Canasvieiras Beach, Boulevard Beach Canasvieiras Hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, garden and free WiFi. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. Praia de Jurerê Beach is located 4 km away. All rooms at Boulevard Beach Canasvieiras Hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a minibar and a bathroom. Guests can enjoy the buffet breakfast each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, cakes, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks. Florianópolis center and Praia Mole Beach are both 27 km away. Praia da Joaquina Beach is 33 km away and Hercílio Luz International Airport is 45 km away.

name: Residencial Cabanas da Praia Mole
address: Rod. Jornalista Manoel de Menezes, 2001, Florianopolis
description: Located on Praia Mole in Florianópolis -SC, Residencial Cabanas da Praia Mole offers simple but very cozy accommodation amidst a vast green area. The cabins have an auxiliary kitchen structure, air conditioning, TV, minibar, private bathroom and free parking in front of the cabin. The facilities – seasonal swimming pool, tennis court, soccer field, playground and direct access to Lagoa da Conceição via a pier. In the vicinity of the Residencial, guests have easy and quick access to several beaches, bars, restaurants and markets. The property is 5 km from the Joaquina dunes, 7 km from Lagoa da Conceição and 17 km from the center of Florianópolis. Hercílio Luz International Airport is 23 km from the accommodation. Wi-Fi is available free of charge in common areas. Breakfast is included on weekdays.

name: Resort pé na areia - Studios direto com proprietário JBVJR
description: Boasting a bar, Resort pé na areia - Studios direto com proprietário JBVJR is set in Florianópolis in the Santa Catarina Island region, 200 metres from Jurere Beach and less than 1 km from Jurerê Tradicional. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Certain rooms at the property feature a balcony with a sea view. The rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a TV, and some units at the resort have a terrace. At Resort pé na areia - Studios direto com proprietário JBVJR every room includes bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Canajure Beach is 2.2 km from Resort pé na areia - Studios direto com proprietário JBVJR, while Praia de Canasvieiras is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 32 km from the resort.

name: Hotel Praia Brava
address: Professor Ari Kardec Bosco de Melo, 145, Florianopolis 88056-807
description: Sitting on Florianópolis’ Praia Brava beach, this hotel features indoor and outdoor pools, a gym and a sauna. It offers buffet breakfast, tour and entertainment services and beach service with sunloungers and parasols. With a TV, minibar and a private bathroom, rooms at Praia Brava Hotel are air-conditioned and practical. Some offer pool views. Laundry services and free Wi-Fi are available. Praia Brava is a 30-minute drive from Florianópolis centre, and 36 km from its bus station. Hercílio Luz international airport is 42 km away. The hotel offers free private parking, and shuttle and car rental services for a fee.

name: Gaivotas Praia Hotel
description: Located in Florianópolis, 300 metres from Ingleses Beach, Gaivotas Praia Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel features a hot tub and a concierge service. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. Guest rooms will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. Floripa Mall is 23 km from Gaivotas Praia Hotel, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 28 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 38 km from the accommodation.

name: Mercure Florianópolis
description: Located in the Itacorubi region, Mercure Florianópolis is ideal for new experiences. The Garapuvu Cafe & Bistro serves delicious specialty coffees, the best in traditional cafeteria, brunch options, snacks and excellent wine menus. Rooms with modern design for couples, individuals and families, with A/C and WiFi. Take advantage of the pool, gym and parking options. Your pet is welcome for a fee.accorhotels.com

name: Pousart Floripa
address: 222 Servidao Elpidio da Rocha Casa, Florianopolis 88048-398
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and an outdoor entertainment area. Other amenities include premium bedding, laundry facilities, towels, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Pousada Tissiano
description: No description found

name: Pousada Lozalti
address: R. Clara Simões Speck, 13 Barra da Lagoa, Florianopolis 88061-255
description: Just 300 metres from Florianópolis’ Barra da Lagoa beach, Lozalti features a BBQ and a pool with a waterslide. WiFi and private parking are free. The air-conditioned apartments feature a flat-screen TV and private bathroom. The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, a cooktop and a refrigerator. Pousada Lozalti is 6 km from Mole Beach and 8 km from Praia da Joaquina beach. Hercílio Luz international airport, Florianópolis bus station and city centre are all 25 km away.

name: Hotel Bruggemann
description: Featuring free Wi-Fi, 24-hour front desk service and a barbecue facility, Hotel Bruggemann is located 5 km from downtown Florianópolis. It offers air-conditioned accommodation, room service and free on-site parking. All rooms at Bruggemann Hotel offer cable TV, a telephone and a bathroom. They are simply styled with tiled floors and provide bed linen and bath towels. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks. Beira-Mar Continental Avenue is just 200 metres away. Lagoa da Conceição Lagoon is 13 km from this hotel. Centro Sul Convention Centre and the Public Market are both within 5 km.

name: Jurerê Beach Village
address: Alameda César Nascimento 646, Governador Celso Ramos 88053-500
description: JURERÊ BEACH VILLAGE features a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in Florianópolis. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The hotel provides sea views, an outdoor pool and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. At JURERÊ BEACH VILLAGE each room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and hot tub. Casa Açoriana Handcraft is 8 km from JURERÊ BEACH VILLAGE, while Floripa Mall is 13 km away.
